message.body: hey did you have a chill weekend?
well yes and no
fri was the concert, it was amazing! great night
sat I went hiking out in lancaster, also fantastic, if not low-key
which concert was it? sounds like a very fun weekend
John Mayer
very cool. did anyone open?
it was, had a lot of contrast.
I went from being in the city in a crowd of 18,000 people to being on top of a mountain all alone
Train opened up but we only caught the last song
yeah wow. lol
How did your weekend go?
weekend wassss....good. busy. lotta work
well..sat was mostly play. went shopping for new dishes after work. met up with a bud I haven't seen in 8 years for lunch, then met up with normal friends for late dinner.
when we came back to my place for games and drinks, my and my friend's dog I was watching had escaped the back yard...that was scary. then we hung a cabinet n went clubbin.
yesterday I worked at my parents kitchen and barthroom from 9-5, then came here and my dad helped me make a cabinet for above the microwave, then I could hardly move...i was so damn tired.
lol
but overall, very good weekend.

interesting. yesterday a friend I haven't seen in ages came over while barry was moving in and we drank waaay to much beer. I got a new bathroom vanity and mirror, but still need to find a top for it.
ahhh he made it :-)
a top? for the vanity, ahhh
what are you thinkin?
they have a granite one that I really like, but its a little pricey
granite is that way
I will shop around first and see. Then I have to take out the old one and put in the new floor. Ive pre-warned barry
for what I paid for the vanity and mirror, I can afford to spend a little extra on the top. It looks pretty tight too
mr. justifier. hahah
yeah, bad habit....:-/
I just looking forward to being done the bath so I can move on to the kitchen
i lost that last thing you said.
yeah, bad habit.... I just looking forward to being done the bath so I can move on to the kitchen
lol. whatever you do, barry's got nothin on gowtham.
gowtham's had to deal with some serious renovations without a single peep, so barry has no room to complain, in my opinioin
well hes only been moved in a day. He seems to take it all in stride.
aight, well I gotta focus a bit here. take it easy
k, cya
